Source code for fitalgorithms.female.range

[docs]class size_range():

[docs]    def __init__(self, fullsize, unit):
        self.fullsize = fullsize
        self.unit = unit
        self.start_bust_range = 0
        self.end_bust_range = 0
        self.start_shoulder_range = 0
        self.end_shoulder_range = 0
        self.start_hip_range = 0
        self.end_hip_range = 0
        self.start_waist_range = 0
        self.end_waist_range = 0



[docs]    def top_range_cm(self):
        bustsizes = [70, 81, 83, 86, 89, 91, 95, 99, 102, 107, 120]
        shouldersizes = [30, 35, 37, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 43, 47]
        size = ['XXS - 00 US', 'XS - 0 US - 4 UK', 'S - 2 US - 6 UK',
                'S - 4 US - 8 UK', 'M - 6 US - 10 UK', 'M - 8 US - 12 UK',
                'L - 10 US - 14 UK', 'L - 12 US - 16 UK ',
                'XL - 14 US - 18 UK', '2X - 18 US - 22 UK']
        index = size.index(self.fullsize)
        if(index > 0)and(index < (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index - 1] - 6
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index + 1] + 6
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == 0):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index] - 6
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index + 1] + 6
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index - 1] - 6
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index] + 6
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index] + 3



[docs]    def bottom_range_cm(self):

        waistsizes = [58, 61, 63, 66, 68, 71, 74, 78, 82, 87, 105]
        hipsizes = [80, 85, 90, 92, 95, 97, 101, 105, 109, 114, 125]
        size = ['XXS - 00 US', 'XS - 0 US - 4 UK', 'S - 2 US - 6 UK',
                'S - 4 US - 8 UK', 'M - 6 US - 10 UK', 'M - 8 US - 12 UK',
                'L - 10 US - 14 UK', 'L - 12 US - 16 UK ',
                'XL - 14 US - 18 UK', '2X - 18 US - 22 UK']

        index = size.index(self.fullsize)
        if(index > 0)and(index < (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index + 1] + 5
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index - 1] - 5
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index + 1] + 12
        elif (index == 0):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index + 1] + 5
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index] - 5
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index + 1] + 12
        elif (index == (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index] + 5
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index - 1] - 5
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index] + 12



[docs]    def top_range_in(self):
        bustsizes = [30, 32, 33, 34, 35,
                     36, 37.5, 39, 40.5, 42.5, 44.5]
        shouldersizes = [12, 14.375, 14.625, 14.875,
                         15.125, 15.375, 15.75, 16.125, 16.5, 17, 17.5]
        size = ['XXS - 00 US', 'XS - 0 US - 4 UK', 'S - 2 US - 6 UK',
                'S - 4 US - 8 UK', 'M - 6 US - 10 UK', 'M - 8 US - 12 UK',
                'L - 10 US - 14 UK', 'L - 12 US - 16 UK ',
                'XL - 14 US - 18 UK', '2X - 18 US - 22 UK']

        index = size.index(self.fullsize)
        if(index > 0)and(index < len(size) - 1):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index + 1] + 3
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == 0):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index] - 2
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index + 1] + 3
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_bust_range = bustsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_bust_range = bustsizes[index] + 3
            self.start_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_shoulder_range = shouldersizes[index] + 3



[docs]    def bottom_range_in(self):
        waistsizes = [22, 24, 25, 26, 27,
                      28, 29.5, 31, 32.5, 34.5, 36.5]
        hipsizes = [32, 34.5, 35.5, 36.5,
                    37.5, 38.5, 40, 41.5, 43, 45, 47]
        size = ['XXS - 00 US', 'XS - 0 US - 4 UK', 'S - 2 US - 6 UK',
                'S - 4 US - 8 UK', 'M - 6 US - 10 UK', 'M - 8 US - 12 UK',
                'L - 10 US - 14 UK', 'L - 12 US - 16 UK ',
                'XL - 14 US - 18 UK', '2X - 18 US - 22 UK']

        index = size.index(self.fullsize)
        if(index > 0)and(index < len(size) - 1):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index + 1] + 2
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == 0):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index + 1] + 3
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index] - 2
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index + 1] + 3
        elif (index == (len(size) - 1)):
            self.start_hip_range = hipsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_hip_range = hipsizes[index] + 3
            self.start_waist_range = waistsizes[index - 1] - 2
            self.end_waist_range = waistsizes[index] + 3



[docs]    def get_range(self):

        if(self.unit == 'cm'):
            self.top_range_cm()
            self.bottom_range_cm()

        elif(self.unit == 'in'):
            self.top_range_in()
            self.bottom_range_in()
